meanings.sent1: Lars is a popular name for boys.
meanings.sent4: In the story, Lars was the hero who saved the day.
meanings.sent5: When Lars enters the room, everyone greets him warmly.

meanings.definition: Lars: plural of lar, a type of Roman household god.
meanings.sent1: The museum displayed many ancient lars.
meanings.sent2: In Roman mythology, lars were believed to protect the household.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous lars played pranks on the other gods.
meanings.sent4: The lars seemed to watch over the family from their shelves.
meanings.sent5: The lars' presence brought a sense of security to the home.

meanings.definition: Lars: a unit of currency in Sweden.
meanings.sent1: I need to exchange my dollars for lars.
meanings.sent2: The price of the item was listed in lars.
meanings.sent3: Lars jingled in my pocket as I walked.
meanings.sent4: She saved up all her lars for a special purchase.
meanings.sent5: The shiny lars gleamed in the sunlight.
